Author: coffinOfcans
Text: Aww your sweet words mean EVERYTHING to me. Thank you so much <3 I guess that is true... no one ever thinks they are sick enough- I guess we have to trust what others say. Thank you for your offer! I definitely will sometime. Can’t thank you enough!!❤️

Author: mangerinez
Text: I don’t think you’ll ever feel sick enough, literally everyone thinks that, i’m following a few ed recovery pages on insta (even if i’m not personally in recovery :))) ) and they all say that. you should go to therapy anyway, the more you act on it the more likely it’ll be that you’ll recover.  Also, you DO deserve to eat, you seem lovely, and you’re definitely not alone, this sub is full of understanding and really sweet people that are going through the same things so you can definitely come here to rant (and if you want, you can definitely message me) ♥️
